attributes.action: grant fathers automatic parental responsibility upon the birth of their child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mothers have automatic parental responsibility over their children but Fathers have to be present at the signing of the Birth Cert. which is not always possible due to working commitments etc. or obtain a court order. We want Fathers to be given the same rights upon birth as Mothers.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Parents-Rights/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
